interfaces.name: UseSessionStorageOptions<T>
interfaces.description:
Configuration options for the useSessionStorage hook
@template T - The type of the value stored in session storage

properties.name: serializer
properties.description: Custom serializer for converting values to/from strings @default { parse: JSON.parse, stringify: JSON.stringify }

properties.name: validator
properties.description: Function to parse a string value from session storage */ Function to stringify a value for session storage */ Optional validator function to validate parsed values @param value - The parsed value to validate @returns The validated value

properties.name: debounceMs
properties.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds for write operations @default 0

properties.name: syncAcrossInstances
properties.description: Whether to sync changes across multiple instances/tabs @default true

properties.name: onError
properties.description: Error handler callback @param error - The error that occurred

interfaces.name: UseSessionStorageActions
interfaces.description: Actions and state information returned by the useSessionStorage hook
